name: MaulderLand
description:
MaulderLand is a survival horror game following the adventures a young woman uncovering a terrifying conspiracy in the streets of an abandoned city. 

It currently has only a free short demo available.

Synopsis

Sixteen years after the calamity that destroyed the city of Orewells, young camerawoman Daisy Runners is sent there to cover its state. What had to be a short coverage on the now abandoned city, becomes a cat-and-mouse game when she discovers the dark truth that currently rules its streets.
